channel.title: Weblogic on Gerald Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Weblogic on Gerald Nguyen

item.title: Weblogic SAXParserFactory Issue
item.description:
I have just wasted 1 whole day trying to debug this issues. Since I get most help from the internet, here is what I can do in return :D

I was trying to build a Spring 3.0 webapp with Tiles 2.2. Since Tiles depends on common-digester which subsequently depends on SAXParserFactory, I got stuck in a whole range of strange Weblogic behaviors.

Firstly, I got UnsupportedOperationException everytime I first access the webapp. Subsequent access is fine, but the first always encounters that exception. Hours of googling tells me that the exception is due to weblogic’s RegistrySAXParserFactory.

item.title: 2-way SSL with WebLogic server 10.3
item.description:
TOOLS

  1. keytool: a key and certificate management tool. Provided as part of Sun’s JDK Online reference: http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/technotes/tools/windows/keytool.htm.

  2. utils.CertGen: a certification generate tool provided by WLS. By default it will generate certificates from default CertGenCA.der and CertGenCAKey.der; but have not been able to generate certificate from other cert and key (probably because of the lack of original cert & key AND CertGenCA has constraint of max 1 descendant). Online renference: http://download.oracle.com/docs/cd/E13222_01/wls/docs103/admin_ref/utils.html#wp1198920
